title: Organic Stress Balance - Tadin Herb & Tea Co.
description: This balance blend is formulated to deliver the comfort you seek during stressful times. Herbs such as Tulsi-holy basil, milky oat straw, and roses are our favorite herbal companions to start or end your day. Tadin's Organic Stress Balance Herbal Tea blossoms with floral roses, sweet licorice, fruity citrus and hints of clove and spice. (Box contains 20 tea bags)
